h2_title: The Webbed Hollow Celestial Nonary Pill
content: The Webbed Hollow Celestial Nonary Pill is hidden behind an elusive quest. You will come across several pillars surrounded by a purple aura throughout the Webbed Hollow. These pillars have small paper charms attached to them. Collect all of the charms before heading to the last one in the Temple of Yellow Flowers.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Celestial_Nonary_Pill_Locations.md', within the main section titled 'Celestial Nonary Pill Locations', specifically from the subsection 'The Webbed Hollow Celestial Nonary Pill'.
The content is as follows:
The Webbed Hollow Celestial Nonary Pill is hidden behind an elusive quest. You will come across several pillars surrounded by a purple aura throughout the Webbed Hollow. These pillars have small paper charms attached to them. Collect all of the charms before heading to the last one in the Temple of Yellow Flowers.
